channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData

item.title: #en @ 1458886330491052037

item.title: #en @ 1458881854090711050
item.description: I think that better data on public transport costs in the UK would be amazing. Ideally much LESS data than we have now. Think about transport in London, the open data on fares is so simple. It's amazingly powerful. Elsewhere we get complexity and nuance which is far worse.

item.title: #en @ 1458868011666968582
item.description:
We're delighted to have been shortlisted in the #opendata award category at #openukcop26 tonight.
It's no shame to have been runner up to @OKFN. Congratulations to them! 👏 👏👏 https://t.co/45PatYJP9i

item.title: #es @ 1458844238452563978
item.description: La @ComunidadMadrid ha dejado inaccesibles los datos de las Zonas Básicas de Salud (ZBS), pero sí los tiene, como se ve en el mapa. ¿Cómo es posible que vayamos para atrás como el cangrejo Sra @IdiazAyuso? #Transparencia #opendata https://t.co/nAau9TEwqv

item.title: #es @ 1458828789912416262
item.description:

Este importante espacio lo compartí con @mino_katherin y @RobertoFalconiC de @PuntonetEcuador.

item.title: #en @ 1458816839157387272
item.description:
Look, Earth Engine is awesome. But I wish the victory lap included more of a nod towards the open data policies that make it all possible.
No Landsat open data, No Sentinel open data = No Google Earth Engine.
https://t.co/a9d74FIWtO https://t.co/GYIItYdM1R

item.title: #en @ 1458802096178872320
item.description:
And some perspective from RPD’s open data portal, it’s possible (because it’s happening) for violent (homicides) to be up, while property crimes are way down. The narratives aren’t mutually exclusive.
Source: https://t.co/rmQCd7i54Q https://t.co/uRrcdIDYGc

item.description: There are some good things about the paper. Data are open on OSF, and upon re-analysis in different software (R) I achieve computational reproducibility for Table 2 and Figure 3 within rounding tolerance. This is already leagues better than many studies with no open data /2

item.title: #es @ 1458790377088028674
item.description: Argentina tomó la decisión bastante atípica de postergar segundas dosis para avanzar aplicando primeras. Deberíamos contar con datos que nos permitan analizar su resultado. Me refiero a datos abiertos que permitan cruzar los fallecidos con su estado de vacunación al menos.
